Clifton.Yantacaw Brook: Yantacaw Brook is a tributary of the Third River in Essex County, New Jersey, United States. The brook rises Montclair and then continues into the Third River in Bloomfield, New Jersey and then into Belleville and Nutley, where it enters the Passaic River. Both Yantacaw Brook and the Third River were referred to by the Lenape people as Yantokah or Yantacaw.
